name: hnswlib-wasm
description: typescript and wasm bindings for Hnswlib
author: Shravan Sunder<shravan.sunder.dev@gmail.com>

scripts.publish:next:pre: npm version prerelease --git-tag-version false && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.publish:next:patch: npm version patch --git-tag-version false && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish:next:minor: npm version minor --git-tag-version false && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish:next:major: npm version major --git-tag-version false && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish:latest:patch: npm version patch --git-tag-version false && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.publish:latest:minor: npm version minor --git-tag-version false && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.publish:latest:major: npm version major --git-tag-version false && npm publish --tag latest
